module.name: product_categorisation
module.purpose: The Product categorization application module supports the requirement to represent structured hierarchies of categories for products.

inscope.li: specifying a data structure to record the names of categories for products;
specifying a data structure to optionally record the description or definition of a product category;
specifying a data structure to relate product categories in a hierarchical manner;
optionally recording what organization or person in organization defines a category for a product.

outscope.li: the actual assigning of categories to products;
all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts to categorize products.

description.p: The Product_categorization UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of categories and hierarchies of categories for products.

aa.refpath: product_category <- (applied_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_organization_assignment {applied_organization_assignment.role -> organization_role organization_role.name='category owner'}) (applied_person_and_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_person_and_organization_assignment {applied_person_and_organization_assignment.role -> person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role.name='category owner'})

usage_guide.p: This clause describes usages of this module. This module may also be used with the Product identification module.
